headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The content type of the request. Allowed value: "application/json" .

parameters.name: advertiser_ids
parameters.description: Ad account IDs that you want to include in the billing group. Note : If you want to create a billing group for Auction ad accounts, you should add all Auction ad accounts to one Billing Group, except the ad accounts registered in France, Brazil, or Mexico. However, if you want to create a billing group of Reservation ad accounts, you should add one Reservation ad account to one Billing Group.

parameters.name: is_primary
parameters.description: Whether to set this billing group as the default billing group for the Business Center.

parameters.name: billing_group_type
parameters.description: The advertising type of all ad accounts in the billing group. This setting can not be edited. Enum values: AUCTION , RESERVATION (to be deprecated)

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: billing_group_id
fields.description: ID of the billing group that was just created.

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log id of the request, which uniquely identifies a request.
